entry.def: A centrifuge is a machine that spins mixtures of different substances around very quickly so that they separate by centrifugal force.

means.word_mean: 1. an apparatus that uses centrifugal force to separate particles from a suspension
1. rotate at very high speed in order to separate the liquids from the solids
